title: Mohawk Paper Logotype
content:
I am working on a project for school which is creating a paper company swatch book.

Can someone please lead me in the direction of a typeface that is similar to this?

Thanks a lot.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194831/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_59.jpg) | 18.83 KB |
author: andy_ab11

comments.content: Futura Medium has some similar characteristics, although it isn't as heavy. And it lacks the distinctive weight characteristics of the W in the Mohawk logo. But it might be a good place to start.
I think it is closer to [Metro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194831/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/metroblack_no_2_com_roman/).
Thanks for the help folks. Appreciate it.
